item.title: 近半数英国税务人员错过了在办公室工作的目标
item.description: 据英国税务部门的高级官员称，英国近一半的税务人员都没有达到政府部门关于工作人员每周三天在办公室工作的要求。【原文：Almost half of Britain’s tax collectors are failing to meet the government department’s requirement for staff to work from the office three days a week, according to its top official.】

item.title: Codelco 在 SQM 股东大会前为锂矿交易辩护
item.description: 智利国有铜业公司 Codelco 为其与 SQM 公司的锂生产合作提案进行了辩护，以回应关于谈判过程不透明的批评。【原文：Chile’s state copper company Codelco defended its proposed lithium production tie-up with SQM in response to criticism that the negotiation process has been opaque.】

item.title: 瑞穗称美元抢购潮可能即将来临
item.description: 瑞穗国际有限公司（Mizuho International Plc）表示，掉期市场正在发出警告，美元流动性可能会出现上一次在大流行病初期出现的规模。【原文：The swaps market is flashing warnings there could be a dash for dollar liquidity on a scale last seen at the start of the pandemic, according to Mizuho International Plc.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛计划在里斯本设立办事处，发掘葡萄牙的富裕阶层
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）计划明年在里斯本开设办事处，以利用越来越多在葡萄牙定居的富裕外国人的财富。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. plans to open an office in Lisbon next year as it seeks to tap into the wealth of a growing number of affluent foreigners taking up residence in Portugal.】

item.title: 津巴布韦副总统称津巴布韦 ZiG 是弃用美元的第一步
item.description: 津巴布韦副总统康斯坦丁诺-奇文加（Constantino Chiwenga）说，津巴布韦的新货币是朝着最终放弃在经济中使用美元迈出的一步。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency is a step toward eventually abandoning the use of US dollars in the economy, Vice President Constantino Chiwenga said.】

item.title: 联合利华冰淇淋出售不会改变我们，本-杰瑞说
item.description: Ben & Jerry 的独立董事会表示，即使母公司联合利华集团（Unilever Plc）出售或分拆冰淇淋部门，也不会停止监督该品牌的 "社会使命"。【原文：Ben & Jerry’s independent board said it won’t stop overseeing the “social mission” of the brand even if parent company Unilever Plc sells or spins off the ice cream unit.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院冻结摩根大通 4.4 亿美元索赔资产
item.description: 圣彼得堡一家法院冻结了摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A St. Petersburg court froze the Russian assets of JPMorgan Chase & Co. pending consideration of a lawsuit from the country’s second-largest bank that seeks to recover about $440 million.】

item.title: 德国阻碍意大利推动七国集团支持核电
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利和德国就七国集团是否应在即将召开的能源部长峰会上提及核能作为绿色转型的一部分发生了冲突。【原文：Italy and Germany have clashed over whether Group of Seven nations should include a reference to nuclear power as part of the green transition at an upcoming summit of energy ministers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私募股权公司以基金资产为抵押借款
item.description: 私募股权公司正试图获得一揽子许可，以其基金资产为抵押借款；这一趋势令一些投资者感到气愤。【原文：Private equity firms are attempting to get blanket permission to borrow against their funds’ assets — a trend that’s exasperating some investors.】

item.title: 医院集团法凯赫及其家族将在利雅得首次公开募股中出售 21.5% 的股份
item.description: 沙特医院集团 Soliman Abdul Kader Fakeeh 医院及其股东计划在利雅得首次公开募股中出售 21.5% 的股份，因为沙特的上市活动在短暂停滞后有所回升。【原文：Saudi hospital group Dr. Soliman Abdul Kader Fakeeh Hospital and its shareholders plan to sell a 21.5% stake in its Riyadh initial public offering, as listings in the kingdom pick up after a short hiatus.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange Inc.【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc. refused a request to introduce daily price limits on cocoa after futures surged this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 孩之宝第一季度盈利超预期，股价上涨
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro Inc. ）股价最高上涨 11%，创下自 2023 年 4 月以来的最大盘中涨幅，此前这家玩具制造商公布的第一季度盈利超出预期，这是该公司扭亏为盈的一个积极迹象。【原文：Hasbro Inc. shares rose as much as 11%, the biggest intraday gain since April 2023, after the toymaker reported first-quarter earnings that beat estimates, a promising sign for the company’s turnaround efforts.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉拖欠 1,540 亿美元债务，已准备好谈判
item.description: 经过多年的起起伏伏，委内瑞拉正在为数十年来规模最大、最复杂的债务重组之一做好准备；解除从华尔街到俄罗斯的债权人所欠的 1,540 亿美元的违约债券、贷款和法律判决。【原文：After years of fits and starts, Venezuela is setting the stage for one of the largest and most complex debt restructurings in decades — unwinding a $154 billion web of defaulted bonds, loans and legal judgments owed to creditors from Wall Street to Russia.】

item.title: B.审计员签字后，莱利公司业绩大涨，但仍指出存在重大问题
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 在其审计师签署了年度报告，且该公司称新的内部审查发现其与一位有争议的前商业伙伴没有任何联系后，在盘前交易中飙升达 59%。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. soared as much as 59% in premarket trading after its auditors signed off on its annual report and the firm said a new internal review found no connection with a controversial former business partner.】

item.title: 毛里求斯出口因南非和欧盟经济放缓而下降
item.description: 毛里求斯出口协会表示，作为依赖进口的经济的重要外汇来源，毛里求斯的制成品外运量可能将连续第二年萎缩，并敦促重新考虑该行业的政策。【原文：Mauritius’s outbound shipments of manufactured goods, a key source of foreign currency for the import-dependent economy, will likely contract for a second straight year, the nation’s export association said, urging a rethink on policy for the industry.】

item.title: 日元走软突破 155 关键点位，干预风险增加
item.description: 日元汇率三十多年来首次跌破 1 美元兑 155 日元的水平，加剧了这一关键水平可能促使日本财务省介入市场的风险。【原文：The yen weakened beyond 155 per dollar for the first time in more than three decades, fueling risk that the key level may prompt Japan’s Ministry of Finance to step into the market.】

item.title: 德雅尔丹集团计划出售 Fiera，控制权成疑
item.description: 加拿大基金管理公司 Fiera Capital Corp. 的最大股东之一希望退出，这让人怀疑公司董事长兼首席执行官让-吉-德雅尔丹（Jean-Guy Desjardins）能否继续控制公司。【原文：One the largest shareholders in Canadian fund manager Fiera Capital Corp. wants out, raising questions about whether Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Jean-Guy Desjardins will be able to keep control of the firm.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气贸易商已开始担心下一个冬季
item.description: 在欧洲天然气市场创纪录的价格波动中沉寂了一年多之后，交易商们又开始焦躁不安了。【原文：After more than a year’s respite from record price swings in Europe’s natural gas market, traders are getting agitated again.】

item.title: KKR 据称考虑以 10 亿美元收购 Healthium Medtech
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.正在考虑收购印度医疗设备制造商Healthium Medtech Ltd.。【原文：KKR & Co. is considering an acquisition of Indian medical-device maker Healthium Medtech Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 冰岛通胀率降至 2022 年以来最低水平
item.description: 冰岛的通货膨胀率降至两年多来最慢，这表明冰岛中央银行更有可能在未来几个月内开始降低西欧的最高利率。【原文：Iceland’s inflation eased to the slowest pace in more than two years, suggesting its central bank is more likely to begin reducing the western Europe’s highest interest rate in the coming months.】

item.title: 大众将推出新的电动车子品牌，吸引挑剔的中国买家
item.description: 大众汽车公司将在中国开始销售一个新的电动汽车品牌，该品牌将配备车载头像等小玩意儿，以帮助其赢回被比亚迪（BYD）等公司甩掉的年轻买家。【原文：Volkswagen AG will start sales of a new electric-vehicle brand in China kitted out with gadgets like an in-car avatar to help win back young buyers it has lost to the likes of BYD Co.】

item.title: 科塔克被禁止增加在线客户和发行信用卡
item.description: 印度市值排名第四的科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）在监管机构指出其技术系统存在治理和风险问题后，被禁止通过数字渠道增加新客户和发行新信用卡。【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd., India’s fourth-largest lender by market value, has been barred from adding new customers through its digital channels and from issuing fresh credit cards after the regulator flagged governance and risk issues about its technology systems.】

item.title: Prada 和 Miu Miu 从中国获得推动力，而竞争对手 Gucci 则举步维艰
item.description: 普拉达公司（Prada SpA）的销售额跃升，这家同时拥有 Miu Miu 的意大利时尚集团继续超越其最大的竞争对手。【原文：Prada SpA’s sales jumped as the Italian fashion group, which also owns Miu Miu, continues to outperform its biggest rivals.】

item.title: 可可价格波动是 20 世纪 70 年代以来最疯狂的一次
item.description: 可可在纽约恢复了涨势，在历史性紧缩的不确定性以及交易商撤出市场的情况下，可可价格出现了近五十年来最剧烈的波动。【原文：Cocoa resumed gains in New York, with prices the most volatile in almost five decades amid uncertainty over a historic crunch and as traders pull out of the market.】

item.title: 俄罗斯推动其最大私人银行在国内迁址
item.description: 俄罗斯开始采取行动，通过寻求暂停其在国外注册的股东的所有权，迫使该国最大的私人银行重新注册。【原文：Russia began moves to compel the country’s largest private bank to redomicile by seeking to suspend the ownership rights of its foreign-registered shareholders.】

item.description:

item.title: 施罗德首席执行官彼得-哈里森即将退休，寻找继任者
item.description: 施罗德公司（Schroders Plc）首席执行官彼得-哈里森（Peter Harrison）计划于 2025 年卸任，这家基金管理公司即将开始寻找继任者。【原文：Schroders Plc Chief Executive Officer Peter Harrison is planning to step down in 2025 and the money manager is soon set to kick off a search for his successor.】
